CustomField.formula: If(ISBLANK(Amount_to_Finance__c), TRUE, if(Amount_to_Finance__c=0, TRUE,if(DocStatusReleaseLetter__c = TRUE &&Release_Letter_Checked__c = TRUE,TRUE,FALSE )))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If Amount to Finance is blank, Release Letter will be auto-ticked
CustomField.label: Release Letter (If Applicable)
